com.teddy.data

Class Power

  • java.lang.Object
    • Activity
      • com.teddy.data.Power

  • public class Power
extends Activity
    Activity which displays a screen to the user with the power usage information in the last 15 minutes.

        Processes the user settings and displays the power usage information for the last 15 minutes.

      • onBackPressed

        public void onBackPressed()
        Called when the back button is pressed. Starts the UsageScreen activity.

        Called when the menu button is pressed. Gives the user the possibility to select an option.

      • onOptionsItemSelected

        public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(MenuItem item)
        Called when the an option from the menu is selected. Starts a new activity for the specific option chosen by the user.
